vouchers.title: 10% Off Your Next Purchase!
vouchers.description: Enjoy a 10% discount on your next purchase at our store. Use code SAVE10 at checkout.

vouchers.title: Free Coffee with Any Meal!
vouchers.description: Get a free coffee when you buy any meal. Just show this voucher at the counter.

vouchers.title: Buy One Get One Free!
vouchers.description: Buy one item and get another one free on selected products. Limited time offer!

vouchers.title: 25% Off for First-Time Customers!
vouchers.description: New to our store? Enjoy 25% off your first purchase with this voucher.
